title: tests: 1705 fails when running around UTC midnight
body:
### I did this

Pushed PR to curl. 1705 did not pass in many jobs. They turned green when re-run.

```
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT test 1705...[managen makes manpage]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT 1705: stdout FAILED:
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT --- log/check-expected	2024-07-13 00:05:33.202554551 +0000
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT +++ log/check-generated	2024-07-13 00:05:33.202554551 +0000
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT @@ -24,7 +24,7 @@
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT .\"[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT .\" DO NOT EDIT. Generated by the curl project managen man page generator.[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT .\"[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT -.TH curl 1 "2024-07-12" "curl 8.9.0" "curl Manual"[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT +.TH curl 1 "2024-07-13" "curl 8.9.0" "curl Manual"[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT .SH DESCRIPTION[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT \fBcurl\fP is a tool for transferring data from or to a server using URLs. It[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT supports these protocols: DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS,[LF]
Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:05:33 GMT == Contents of files in the log/ dir after test 1705
```
Ref: https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/9915475186/job/27396416495?pr=14172#step:23:3240
Ref: https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/9915475193/job/27396380286?pr=14172

Maybe we should set `SOURCE_DATE_EPOCH` for tests and also honor it for `%DATE` in test data?


### I expected the following

Tests to pass.


### curl/libcurl version

master


### operating system

any
